text: Me Akar Aghuimɨn guizbangɨra mɨgɨrɨgɨaba deravɨra dar gɨn zui puvatɨ. Ezɨ kɨ kamaghɨn men arazir kurabar ganigha, Pita men damazimɨn kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Pita, nɨ Judabar gumazir mam, egha nɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Krais Iesusɨn iti, egha nɨ Judan Araziba ategha, Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibar arazir mabagh ami. Gumazir maba Jems ko ikegha izezɨma, nɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibar araziba ategha, manmaghsua ua Judan Arazibagh ami? Nɨ kamaghɨn amuava, manmaghsua Judan Arazibar gɨn mangasa Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibav gɨa, me abɨri?”
